content: Great choices! Both the Bernina Express and the Cinque Terre Train offer amazing scenery with a mix of mountains and sea views. The Bernina Express takes you through the Swiss Alps and offers panoramic views of glaciers, lakes, and mountains. On the other hand, the Cinque Terre train takes you through the picturesque villages of Italy's Ligurian coast, with spectacular views of colorful towns perched on cliff faces and the dazzling blue sea. Whichever one you choose, you're sure to have a memorable and breathtaking experience.
